node.title: [PWGDQ] Additions to mixing library and fixed conflict for tablemaker
Please consider the following formatting changes to #13675
[PWGCF] FemtoUniverse: Fix bug in filling deta-dphi at lower and upper limit of kT
[Common] ZDC task for exploring light ions
[PWGJE] trackEfficiency: add custom track selection for systematics study
[PWGLF] Strangeness in jets add mc centrality for event loss
[Infrastructure] Add mpuccio as codeowner for MM (legacy)
[PWGCF] Add missing histogram and multiple QA Registries
[PWGJE] jetSpectraCharged: standardise event sel, and other small changes
[Common] Add run number column to ZDC extra table
[Common,PWGCF] added efficiency correction via CCDB histogram, particle reconstruction to remove background
[PWGLF] Added strangeness TOF selection for V0
[PWGHF] replace legacy decay channels for SigmaC.
[Common] Use TOF Response parameters as a service
[PWGDQ] Add FIT information to DQ reduced data tables
[PWGLF] Strangeness V0 analysis pp: Fix missing centrality for antilambda
[Common] TOF: add possibility to compute sigma and nsigma dynamically
[PWGCF] add dpt cut, modify dpt vs cent
[PWGLF] StraTOF: Addition of hasTOF functionality, remove ITS requirement
[PWGEM/Dilepton] update HFll in MC with status code
[PWGLF] Add minimum separation variable among daughter kaons
[PWGLF] Added the TOF switch of KstarInOO.cxx
[PWGHF] First draft of Xic0Omegac0 workflow update
[PWGDQ] fix bug in dqefficiency_withassoc, and redefined some signal
[PWGHF] taskFlow.cxx: solve issues with FT0C, add 3D reassociation of MFT tracks
[Common] Including global track DCAs and global splitting for MCH halves
[PWGHF] Update correlatorHfeHadrons.cxx and  electronSelectionWithTpcEmcal.cxx: group BCsWithTimestamps in MC rec and add invariant mass column
[PWGHF] Add centrality dependence to D0hadron correlator and correlation task
[PWGLF] Updated selections, fixed mcgen bug and soft-coded nMaxHistograms
[PWGUD] Added option to set circular N Sigma cut
[PWGLF] Fix bug in finding bin number of histo
[PWGCF] FlowSP: Update table to hold timestamp, all event selections and different centrality estimators
[PWGHF] Add a mass axis to final Thnsparse Correlation Data
[PWGLF] added event and signal loss for pp
[PWGLF] Added run number and electrons from pi0 to output
[PWGJE] (b-jet tree creator) Removed jet event weight task dependencies
[PWGDQ] Adding the code for the energy correlators analysis
[Tutorial] ML inference task: avoid crash when running the skeleton
[PWGLF] NucleiTask - Add process function for losses
[PWGJE] trackEfficiency: FT0M or C for centrality, other fixes/cleaning
[Common] Adding task to read the table created for light ions and ZDC analysis
[PWGHF] Add UPC process functions to taskDplus and taskD0
[PWGDQ] Simplify the DQ UPC event selection
[PWGLF] fixed strange hadron selection in generated mc
[PWGEM/Dilepton] don't use getProcess == 4 for hb->hc->l decay
[PWGCF] New derived tabled based longrange correlation task
[PWGDQ,PWGJE] Add variables to dielectronAll and mixing library
